deactivateAccount.title: Deactivate Account
deactivateAccount.description: All your data such as personal information, chat history, chat request etc. will be made private & unaccessible unless reactivated. To reactivate your account you can just login.
deactivateAccount.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: All your personal information and account will be deleted permanently.

userVerification.jobseekerUploadTitle: Please upload image of your citizenship or passport to verify account.
userVerification.companyUploadTitle: Please upload image of your company registration certificate to verify your account.
userVerification.uploadHelperInfo: You can upload upto {{MAX_ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION_IMAGES}} images. It may take upto 48 hours to verify your account.
userVerification.verificationPending: Your account is under verification. Stay tuned!

subscription.getUnlimitedSwipes: Get unlimited swipes and send unlimited requests!
subscription.unsubscribeInformation: Please cancel your subscription before deactivating or deleting your account.
subscription.cancelSubscriptionConfirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel the subscription?
subscription.cancelSubscriptionFromMobile: Please cancel subscription from mobile application before deactivating or deleting your account.
subscription.canCancelFromApp: You can cancel subscription from mobile application.

reportProfile.title: Report Profile
reportProfile.description: Your feedback is anonymous and they won't know that you've reported them.
